import React from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { Animated } from "react-animated-css"; import Toolbar from "@material-ui/core/Toolbar"; import Button from "@material-ui/core/Button"; import { getApod, getMrp } from "../actions/formActions/actions"; import { withStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import Card from "@material-ui/core/Card"; import CardActionArea from "@material-ui/core/CardActionArea"; import CardContent from "@material-ui/core/CardContent"; import CardMedia from "@material-ui/core/CardMedia"; import Typography from "@material-ui/core/Typography"; import "./main.css"; const styles = { body: { display: "grid", justifyItems: "center", gridTemplateColumns: "repeat(3, 1fr)", gridColumnGap: 50, justifyContent: "space-evenly", position: "relative", bottom: 100, opacity: "0.8", backgroundColor: "#d8dcf28a", padding: 50, borderRadius: "10%" }, card: { maxWidth: 300, maxHeight: 250 }, media: { objectFit: "cover" }, text: { fontFamily: "Quicksand", fontWeight: "bold" }, failure: { color: "white" } }; function Main(props) { const { classes } = props; return (

The whole universe on your screen

APOD Get the astronomy picture of the day, everyday! Mars Rover Photos Get the images taken by the Mars Rovers! NASA IVL Search media on NASA's Image and Video Library! NASA IVL Search media on NASA's Image and Video Library! NASA IVL Search media on NASA's Image and Video Library! NASA IVL Search media on NASA's Image and Video Library!
); } const mapDispatchToProps = { getApod: getApod, getMrp: getMrp }; Main.propTypes = { classes: PropTypes.object.isRequired }; const withstyles = withStyles(styles)(Main); const mainConnected = connect( null, mapDispatchToProps )(withstyles); export default mainConnected;
